law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] Appropriations by the general court, unless specifically designated as special, shall be for the ordinary maintenance of the several departments, offices, commissions and institutions of the commonwealth and shall be made for the fiscal year unless otherwise specifically provided therein. Chapter 29: Appropriations for fiscal year [ Text of section as recodified by 2012, 165, Sec. 112 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] Appropriations by the general court shall be made for the fiscal year unless otherwise specifically provided in such appropriation.
